name: Curiosity (tehwalkingtrash)
description:
Help Kitty find some food on a huge, dark house...

...and try not to be eaten.

A small horror game created for the Duel Game Jam. The theme between me and my partner (https://cherylrai.itch.io/) was "spooky" and "paper graphics".
Due to real life hurdles it's half-done, especially the cutscenes, but at least it's playable and, hopefully enjoyable.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows: Move

Space: Meow (attracts the monster)

E: Shows trail to current goal

ESC: Pause

I hope you enjoy it :)

Comments are much appreciated! ^_^
